Authors.description: Renowned English novelist known for her romantic fiction.
Legendary English playwright and poet, often called England's national poet.
Influential Victorian novelist known for vivid characters and social criticism.
Queen of Crime, renowned for her detective novels and mystery stories.
Author and journalist, best known for dystopian novels and political writings.
Novelist and poet, best known for her only novel, Wuthering Heights.
Colombian novelist and Nobel Prize winner, known for magical realism.
